title: Mobile Snatching near Market Road
summary: Victim reported mobile snatching on 2025-11-20 at 2130 hrs near Market Road. Two suspects on a motorcycle.

stages.info: FIR received. Victim: Ramesh; Time: 2130; Place: Market Road; Two male suspects on a motorcycle.
stages.question: What is your immediate next step?
options: Visit the Scene of Crime (SOC) and record observations
Collect CDRs immediately from the provider
File a charge sheet against unknown accused
Start media outreach for CCTV request
stages.feedback_wrong: Before technical requests, an SOC visit is mandatory to preserve evidence and gather witness names.
stages.next_info: SOC conducted: Nearby shopkeeper remembers a red motorcycle and a CCTV camera facing the road; footage stored offsite at the mall.

stages.info: SOC: Partial plate 'DL3S'; mall CCTV may hold footage.
stages.question: Which evidence would you request next?
options: Request CCTV footage from the mall security for 2100-2145 hrs
Immediately obtain CDR for the victim's phone
Ignore CCTV and focus on witness sketches
Send team to search Old Bridge area only
stages.feedback_wrong: CCTV is time-sensitive and likely to show the suspects or bike; request it immediately.
stages.next_info: Mall security provides footage showing a red motorcycle with two riders; plate blurred but ending 'S'.

stages.info: CCTV shows bike; witness mentions a nearby repair shop where a bike had its tail plate replaced.
stages.question: Next logical step?
options: Visit the repair shop and check records/ask for recent sales
Post suspect images on social media seeking IDs
Close the case due to lack of evidence
stages.feedback_wrong: Investigate leads â€” visit the shop and ask about recent buyers.
stages.next_info: Repair shop owner provides buyer name 'Amit Kumar' and a contact number.
